experience.description: Developed and maintained scalable microservices using Python and FastAPI. Collaborated with the DevOps team to streamline deployment processes using Docker and Kubernetes. Improved system performance by 20% through database indexing and query optimization.

Built responsive front-end components using React.js and Redux. Participated in daily stand-ups and Agile sprint planning. Wrote comprehensive unit tests using Jest to ensure high code coverage and reliability.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
